channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: I would like for politicians to stop using the phrase “I did not make this decision lightly” and instead replace it with the actual reasons they made that decision.
item.source:markdown: I would like for politicians to stop using the phrase “I did not make this decision lightly” and instead replace it with the actual reasons they made that decision.

item.description: Whatever happened with the call for submissions for academic papers for an edited academic volume on Good Omens and the Bible? Is that issue going forward, @JIBS_Journal? https://t.co/Ws7DayPlld
item.source:markdown: Whatever happened with the call for submissions for academic papers for an edited academic volume on Good Omens and the Bible? Is that issue going forward, @JIBS_Journal? https://t.co/Ws7DayPlld

item.description: Leather jacket weather is coming. #dlws
item.source:markdown: Leather jacket weather is coming. #dlws

item.description:
Would I look good in a bok choy pattern Hawaiian shirt? https://t.co/H0S11rnYDb

Someone that I have tremendous respect for said Yes, so I ordered it.
item.source:markdown:
Would I look good in a bok choy pattern Hawaiian shirt? https://t.co/H0S11rnYDb
Someone that I have tremendous respect for said Yes, so I ordered it.

item.description:
Tonight. https://t.co/la6RcLCRkQ

I’m wearing my @vancanadians hat in honour of what might be the former Vancouver Canadians pitcher @STR0’s last start in Toronto.

Most people think it’s a Cubs hat, and guess who’s playing today?

My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/CxMNoTKVR1
item.source:markdown:
Tonight. https://t.co/la6RcLCRkQ
I’m wearing my @vancanadians hat in honour of what might be the former Vancouver Canadians pitcher @STR0’s last start in Toronto.
Most people think it’s a Cubs hat, and guess who’s playing today?
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/CxMNoTKVR1

item.description: @seanorr If you do, can you send me one?
item.source:markdown: @seanorr If you do, can you send me one?

item.description: @Stv In the words of Marlo Stanfield: “Don’t seem possible.”
item.source:markdown: @Stv In the words of Marlo Stanfield: “Don’t seem possible.”

item.description: VAR is killing baseball.
item.source:markdown: VAR is killing baseball.

item.description: @BovyMaltz On the BBC Four show The Thick of It, the Secretary of State for Social Affairs Hugh Abbot is ranting to his senior special advisor about regular people and he asks “Why do they wear clothes with writing on them?” I think about that line a lot.
item.source:markdown: @BovyMaltz On the BBC Four show The Thick of It, the Secretary of State for Social Affairs Hugh Abbot is ranting to his senior special advisor about regular people and he asks “Why do they wear clothes with writing on them?” I think about that line a lot.

item.description: If there’s going to be private security in public parks, that makes them not public parks. https://t.co/0tDFGFai7S
item.source:markdown: If there’s going to be private security in public parks, that makes them not public parks. https://t.co/0tDFGFai7S

item.description: Will riders be given the option to pay the fare to avoid the fine? https://t.co/cg3kNjhmxi
item.source:markdown: Will riders be given the option to pay the fare to avoid the fine? https://t.co/cg3kNjhmxi

item.description:
@Kimli All of B.C.’s weather types, but over the course of a single day, every day. Plan accordingly.

Never hotter than 25 degrees Celsius. Windy basically all the time, sometimes strong enough to blow you over.
item.source:markdown:
@Kimli All of B.C.’s weather types, but over the course of a single day, every day. Plan accordingly.
Never hotter than 25 degrees Celsius. Windy basically all the time, sometimes strong enough to blow you over.

item.description: @fakehistoryhunt Another one for your files, @gruber?

item.description: Monica is undergoing a complete rewrite. I look forward to again deciding not to use it. https://t.co/jFBJyiFBFx
item.source:markdown: Monica is undergoing a complete rewrite. I look forward to again deciding not to use it. https://t.co/jFBJyiFBFx

item.description: A guy sitting on the ground offered me a puff of his joint because he said I looked like Jerry Garcia and that settles it, the beard comes off this fall.
item.source:markdown: A guy sitting on the ground offered me a puff of his joint because he said I looked like Jerry Garcia and that settles it, the beard comes off this fall.

item.description: The best time in Toronto is right now, and the best place is the area around Rogers SkyDome and the convention centre when a ballgame and FAN EXPO let out at the same time. A people-watcher’s dream scenario
item.source:markdown: The best time in Toronto is right now, and the best place is the area around Rogers SkyDome and the convention centre when a ballgame and FAN EXPO let out at the same time. A people-watcher’s dream scenario

item.description: @BovyMaltz My building has a "It’ll get taken care of, somehow” place where we put stuff to get taken care of, somehow, and that’s where I put mine.
item.source:markdown: @BovyMaltz My building has a "It’ll get taken care of, somehow” place where we put stuff to get taken care of, somehow, and that’s where I put mine.

item.description:
I’m taking this course! https://t.co/2kgM4tuul6

If there was a Canadian Baseball Hall of Shame, this guy would be in it. https://t.co/tHizu54m94
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
Come to Toronto, @Kimli, and let’s go to a baseball-themed bar and eat a hot dog with me. https://t.co/fjNNBUXrVK

I don’t know how to put this any other way, @Kimli, but there are pinball machines in the back.

Oh, and hey @Kimli, make sure you’re here in Toronto on a Tuesday when the Blue Jays are in town, since it’ll be Loonie Dogs Night, and we’ll challenge these lunatics to a hot dog eating contest. https://t.co/sMjUHjFawO
item.source:markdown:
Come to Toronto, @Kimli, and let’s go to a baseball-themed bar and eat a hot dog with me. https://t.co/fjNNBUXrVK
I don’t know how to put this any other way, @Kimli, but there are pinball machines in the back.
Oh, and hey @Kimli, make sure you’re here in Toronto on a Tuesday when the Blue Jays are in town, since it’ll be Loonie Dogs Night, and we’ll challenge these lunatics to a hot dog eating contest. https://t.co/sMjUHjFawO

item.description: @skinnylatte Here come the Europeans to say “This is actually quite common in Europe.” We have tram-only lanes in Toronto, but few (or none) of which are grassed tramways. I’m going to read this PDF and become an expert on the subject now. https://t.co/femMxHhtHC
item.source:markdown: @skinnylatte Here come the Europeans to say “This is actually quite common in Europe.” We have tram-only lanes in Toronto, but few (or none) of which are grassed tramways. I’m going to read this PDF and become an expert on the subject now. https://t.co/femMxHhtHC

item.description:
@Sean_YYZ So, so good. It shot into my top 5 movies of all time on first viewing.

And this video about it. Chills just thinking about it. https://t.co/eYtYPRB9gR
